original: Lindström, Per Einar, apotekare, Halmstad, f. 27/7/89 i Västra Ryd, Ös-tergöti. 1., av folkskollär. Carl Johan L. o. Louise Andersson. G. 25 m. Elisabeth Odrich. Barn: Folke f. 27, Vera 30, Carl-Johan 31. — Stud:ex. 09, farm. kand. 15, apot:ex. 20. Anst. v. apot. Enhörningen i Sthlm 15-17, Vakteln i Halmstad 20-38, priv. å apot. i Torup 38, transp. t. Vakteln i Halmstad 46. Ordf. i Torups luftskydds-fören., rusthållsfören. o. pistolklubb samt v. luftskyddsfogde 40-46, ordf. i Torups civilförsvarsnd 44-46, styr :led. i Hall. läns pistolskyttekrets sed. 45. Hobbies : golf, pistolskytte, konst, musik m. m. Sv. pistolskytteförb. ftj :-SM, RLSFs ftj:SAl, idr:- o. pistol-skyttem. i guld m. m.
translated: Lindström, Per Einar, pharmacist, Halmstad, b. 27/7/89 in Västra Ryd, Östergötland. 1st child of elementary school teacher Carl Johan L. and Louise Andersson. Married in 1925 to Elisabeth Odrich. Children: Folke b. 1927, Vera b. 1930, Carl-Johan b. 1931. - Graduated from high school in 1909, pharmaceutical bachelor in 1915, licensed pharmacist in 1920. Employed at the pharmacy "Enhörningen" in Stockholm from 1915 to 1917, "Vakteln" in Halmstad from 1920 to 1938, and then privately in Torup from 1938. Transferred back to "Vakteln" in Halmstad in 1946. Chairman of the Torup Air Defense Association, the Landowner Association, and the Pistol Club, as well as deputy air defense official from 1940 to 1946. Chairman of the Torup Civil Defense Committee from 1944 to 1946, and board member of the Halland County Pistol Shooting District since 1945. Hobbies: golf, pistol shooting, art, music, and more. Swedish Pistol Shooting Federation Champion - Swedish National Championships, Royal Swedish Shooting Federation Gold Medal, and more.

structured.name: Per Einar Lindström
honors: Swedish Pistol Shooting Federation - Swedish National Championships
Royal Swedish Shooting Federation Gold Medal
